title: Justiciar's Scimitar
content:

This light, curved blade is as unsusual and unforgiving as the Darkness it strikes from.

Scimitar Light Finesse

Justiciar's Scimitar is one of the Slashing Weapons in Baldur's Gate 3. Justiciar's Scimitar is a crafty magical scimitar that allows to attack from concealmente without alerting the enemy and has a chance to Blind if attacking with advantage.
